Name: Faience shabti
Description: A small blue-glazed faience shabti with details in black. The eyes have been defined in black paint with particular attention to the cosmetic lines. The figure carries two moulded and painted hoes and has a small, plain square basket on it's back. The long wig is decorated with a simple seshed-headband, tied at the back. On the front is a single line of text without borders.
